item.title: 纳格尔称利率处于 "非常好的水平"，欧洲央行可灵活行事
item.description: 理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，欧元区借贷成本适合持续的贸易逆风，允许欧洲央行在必要时应对进一步的冲击。【原文：Euro-zone borrowing costs are appropriate for the continuing trade headwinds, allowing the European Central Bank to respond to further shocks as needed, according to Governing Council member Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: 巴西糖产量创五个月来最长升势
item.description: 纽约原糖期货连续第三天上涨，创下自2月21日以来的最长连涨纪录，原因是市场再次担心巴西这个最大的甘蔗种植国的甘蔗产量下降可能会减少供应。【原文：Raw sugar futures advanced in New York for a third day — the longest winning streak since Feb. 21 — on renewed concerns over weaker cane yields in top grower Brazil that will likely reduce supplies.】

item.title: 电力生产商需要签署大型人工智能协议，以证明股价飙升的合理性
item.description:
寄希望于数据中心推动美国电力需求激增的投资者开始失去耐心。【原文：

Investors counting on a data center-fueled surge in US electricity demand are getting impatient.

】

item.title: 交易员押注英国央行 6 月前减息至 3%，寻求 16 倍回报
item.description: 一位交易员押注英国央行将在明年年中之前降息 100 个基点，比货币市场目前暗示的预期高出一倍多。【原文：A trader has placed a wager on the Bank of England lowering interest rates 100 basis points by the middle of next year, more than double the expectations currently implied by money markets.】

item.title: 乌克兰声称俄罗斯奥伦堡氦气设施遭到无人机袭击
item.description: 在本月对能源基础设施的袭击愈演愈烈之际，乌克兰声称对俄罗斯的一家重要氦气厂进行了袭击。【原文：Ukraine claimed a strike on a key helium plant in Russia amid intensified attacks on energy infrastructure this month.】

item.title: 印度与中国将恢复直飞航班，标志着两国关系更加密切
item.description: 熟悉谈判情况的人士说，印度和中国最快将于下个月恢复直飞航班，因为世界上人口最多的两个国家正在寻求重启两国的政治关系。【原文：India and China are set to resume direct flight connections as soon as next month, people familiar with the negotiations said, as the world’s two most populous countries seek to reset their political ties.】

item.title: 关税惠及消费者，美国通胀率有望上升
item.description: 底特律东方市场的购物者。摄影师：艾米丽-埃尔科宁/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Shoppers at Eastern Market in Detroit. Photographer: Emily Elconin/Bloomberg】

item.title: 恒大股票退市：中国房地产危机的里程碑
item.description: 中国恒大集团表示，其香港股票将退市，这标志着这家昔日高歌猛进的开发商时代的终结。【原文：China Evergrande Group said its Hong Kong stock will be delisted, marking the end of an era for the former high-flying developer whose demise came to symbolize the country’s property bust.】

item.title: 恒大债务高达 450 亿美元，重组无望
item.description: 中国恒大集团的债务负担远比早先估计的要大，高达 3,500 亿港元（450 亿美元），据该开发商的法庭指定清算人称，该中国房地产公司的任何 "整体 "重组都被认为是遥不可及的。【原文：China Evergrande Group’s debt load is far bigger than earlier estimated, amounting to HK$350 billion ($45 billion) as any “holistic” restructuring of the Chinese real estate firm is deemed out of reach, according to the developer’s court-appointed liquidators.】

item.title: 索尼和任天堂抵御关税的能力使日本成为新的避风港
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，弗拉德-萨沃夫（Vlad Savov）将关注大型科技公司在日本爆发的乐观情绪，游戏和人工智能正推动日本股市创下新高。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Vlad Savov looks at the outburst of optimism about big tech names in Japan, where gaming and AI are fueling stocks to new highs.】

item.title: 中美关税休战延长，习近平与卢拉就贸易团结发表讲话
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将与中国达成的关税休战协议延长了 90 天，为美国进口商提供了一些喘息空间，以便在传统的航运旺季将货物运过太平洋。【原文：President Donald Trump extended a tariff truce with China for another 90 days, giving US importers some breathing room to transport goods across the Pacific through what’s traditionally been peak shipping season.】

item.title: 迪拜的住房繁荣引发了对另一场崩溃的担忧
item.description:
该市的房屋销售量创下历史新高，但一些观察家担心 2009 年的情况会重演。【原文：

The city is experiencing record home sales, but some observers worry about a 2009 repeat.

】

item.title: 特朗普下台后，美国关税税率仍将继续走高
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天我们将探讨美国长期加征关税的可能性。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. Today we’re looking at the likelihood of US tariff hikes sticking for the long haul. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 林肯称私人信贷的 PIK 使用率接近四年来的最高点
item.description: 评估公司林肯国际（Lincoln International）的数据显示，第二季度至少延期支付部分现金利息的私人信贷借款人比例飙升至近四年来的最高点，表明这个价值 1.7 万亿美元的市场压力越来越大。【原文：The share of private credit borrowers that deferred at least some of their cash interest payments surged in the second quarter to the highest in almost four years, pointing to growing stress in the $1.7 trillion market, according to data from valuation firm Lincoln International.】

item.title: 城堡湖公司推出 18 亿美元航空贷款平台
item.description: 私人信用贷款公司 Castlelake LP 将首次推出一个航空贷款平台，该平台已拥有超过 18 亿美元的资金，并将由 Patrick Mahoney 领导。【原文：Private credit lender Castlelake LP is debuting an aviation lending platform that already holds more than $1.8 billion of capital and is tapping Patrick Mahoney to lead it.】

item.title: 回购交易周六登陆区块链，国债 24 小时全天候运行
item.description: 在华尔街传统市场管道的一个转折点上，一些金融界大佬利用加密区块链将美国国债换成了数字美元。这次交易是通过 Tradeweb 在 Canton Network 上进行的，它暗示着未来的交易将不再局限于标准的营业周。【原文：In a twist on Wall Street’s traditional market plumbing, some of the biggest names in finance used a crypto blockchain to trade US Treasuries for digital dollars — on a Saturday. The deal, carried out on the Canton Network through Tradeweb, hints at a future where trading is no longer confined to the standard business week.】

item.title: 随着支付行业竞争加剧，西联汇款酝酿推出自己的稳定币
item.description: 拥有 175 年历史的汇款巨头西联汇款公司（Western Union Co.【原文：Western Union Co., the 175-year-old remittance giant, is considering launching its own dollar-backed stablecoin, as a growing number of cryptocurrency projects compete with its core business of moving money across international borders.】

item.title: 墨西哥金融科技公司希望在 2027 年进行首次公开募股并实现盈利
item.description: 墨西哥金融科技公司 Stori 首席执行官 Bin Chen 表示，在今年实现可持续盈利后，该公司将在 24 个月内做好首次公开募股的准备。【原文：Mexican fintech Stori is betting that it can be ready for an initial public offering in 24 months after reaching sustainable profitability this year, Chief Executive Officer Bin Chen said.】

item.title: 芝加哥申请成为生物技术中心获 1 亿美元资助
item.description: 芝加哥正努力成为包括生命科学在内的新技术的主要推动者，并将获得 1 亿美元的资金支持。【原文：Chicago’s bid to become a key driver of new technologies including life sciences is about to get a $100 million boost.】

item.title: 财报发布前的人工智能支出为 CoreWeave 交易员壮胆
item.description: 为人工智能建立计算能力的竞赛正在重新激发对华尔街最具争议股票之一的看涨押注：CoreWeave Inc.【原文：The race to build computing capacity for artificial intelligence is reviving bullish bets on one of Wall Street’s most contentious stocks: CoreWeave Inc.】

item.title: Circle 第二季度亏损，收入增长 53
item.description: 稳定币发行商Circle Internet Group Inc.在经历了多年来最辉煌的首次公开募股后仅两个月就表示，公司第二季度出现亏损，但收入增幅超过预期。【原文：Just two months after one one of the splashiest public debuts in years, stablecoin issuer Circle Internet Group Inc. said that it had a second-quarter loss and revenue rose more than estimated.】

item.title: 食品价格下降，印度通胀降至 8 年低点
item.description: 印度上个月的通胀率降至八年来的最低点，但央行预测未来几个月的物价涨幅可能会逐步上升。【原文：India’s inflation eased to the lowest in eight years last month, though the central bank forecasts that the price gains may inch up in the coming months.】

item.title: 网上购物者持续消费，海上销售额超出预期
item.description: 随着越来越多的东南亚消费者转向网上购物，从 iPhone 到日常杂货，Sea Ltd. 第二季度的销售额超过了分析师的预期。【原文：Sea Ltd. second-quarter sales beat analysts’ estimates as more of Southeast Asia’s consumers turn to online shopping for anything from iPhones to daily groceries.】

item.title: 经济型轿车需求激增，马恒达提升南非产能
item.description: 马恒达有限公司（Mahindra & Mahindra Ltd.）正在将其南非工厂的产能提高三分之二，这家印度产值最大的汽车制造商正努力利用非洲大陆最大经济体对低成本汽车的需求。【原文：Mahindra & Mahindra Ltd. is boosting capacity at its South Africa plant by two-thirds as India’s largest automaker by value seeks to capitalize on the demand for lower-cost vehicles in the continent’s biggest economy.】

item.title: 英国为泰晤士河水务公司设立管理机构以防崩溃
item.description: 据一位不愿透露姓名的熟悉内情的人士称，英国政府在加紧准备应对泰晤士水务公司可能倒闭的同时，任命 FTI Consulting 为特别管理程序提供建议，以备不时之需。【原文：The UK government appointed FTI Consulting to advise on the special administration process in case it’s needed, as it intensifies preparations for the potential failure of Thames Water, according to a person familiar with the matter, who spoke on the condition of anonymity.】

item.title: 中国汽车制造商未能兑现加快向供应商付款的承诺
item.description: 在中国的主要汽车制造商中，仅有三家履行了在 60 天内向供应商付款的承诺，这凸显了在长期价格战的推动下，维持现金流和彻底改变经营方式所面临的挑战。【原文：Just three of China’s major automakers have met a pledge to pay suppliers within 60 days, underscoring the challenges of maintaining cash flow and overhauling business practices prompted by a long-running price war.】

item.title: 耗资 3.4 亿美元改造纽约办公室，将会议室改成卧室
item.description:
城市对适应性再利用项目的支持提供了急需的住房存量。【原文：

The city’s embrace of adaptive reuse projects is providing much-needed housing stock.

】

item.title: 科勒达成创纪录的 30 亿美元私人信贷二级交易
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份声明，英国私人资产二级市场投资商 Coller Capital Ltd. 与中型市场直贷公司 TPG Twin Brook Capital Partners 达成了一项交易，将成立一个 30 亿美元的延续基金。【原文：Coller Capital Ltd., a UK-based investor in the secondary market for private assets, closed a deal with middle-market direct lender TPG Twin Brook Capital Partners to establish a $3 billion continuation fund, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: ULA 的火神火箭将首次执行国家安全任务
item.description: 联合发射联盟（United Launch Alliance）将用其新开发的 "火神 "火箭首次执行国家安全任务，这是对该火箭将卫星送入地球上空高轨道能力的一次关键测试。【原文：United Launch Alliance is set to perform its first national security mission with its newly developed Vulcan rocket, a key test of the vehicle’s ability to put satellites into high orbits above the Earth.】

item.title: 美国小型企业对经济的乐观情绪升至五个月高点
item.description: 由于企业主对经济前景更加乐观，推动了扩张计划的加快，7 月份美国小企业的信心攀升至五个月来的最高点。【原文：Sentiment among US small businesses climbed to a five-month high in July as owners grew more upbeat about the economic outlook, fueling a pickup in expansion plans.】
